mapper.select:
select OpId, empname from User_employee where compid = #{compid} and useing = 'true'
and empname like '%'+#{searchName}+'%'
select deptid, name from User_dept where compid = #{compid} and RecStatus = 'true'
select PI_TypeName requestStatusName, PI_Values requestStatusCode from DD_PublicInfo where PI_Class = '75' and RecStatus = 1 and compid =#{compid} order by PI_Values
select RequestNumber from WM_ConFigureApply where compid = #{compid} and RequestNumber like '%' + #{requestNumber} + '%'
select PI_TypeName requestModeName, PI_Values requestModeCode from DD_PublicInfo where PI_Class = '76' and RecStatus = 'true' and compid =#{compid} order by PI_Values
select MnemonicCode, GoodsName, Specification from WM_AccessCatalog where Compid = #{compid}

select w.RequestNumber, d1.PI_TypeName RequestMode, w.RequestMode requestCode, d2.PI_TypeName requestStatus, w.RequestStatus requestStatusCode, w.Department, u.name, w.Buyer, w.VerifyIdOne, w.VerifyStatusOne, w.VerifyTimeOne, w.AuditResultOne, w.VerifyIdTwo, w.VerifyStatusTwo, w.VerifyTimetwo, w.AuditResultTwo, w.VerifyIdThree, w.VerifyStatusThree, w.VerifyTimeThree, w.AuditResultThree, w.VerifyIdFour, w.VerifyStatusFour, w.VerifyTimeFour, w.AuditResultFour, w.VerifyIdFive, w.VerifyStatusFive, w.VerifyTimeFive, w.AuditResultFive, w.VerifyIdSix, w.VerifyStatusSix, w.VerifyTimeSix, w.AuditResultSix, w.RequestDep, w.GoodsName, w.Specification, w.CreateTime, w.Amount, w.Num, w.Remarks, w.CreateTime from WM_ConFigureApply w left join DD_PublicInfo d1 on d1.PI_Class = '76' and w.RequestMode = d1.PI_Values and w.compid =d1.compid left join DD_PublicInfo d2 on d2.PI_Class = '75' and w.RequestStatus = d2.PI_Values and w.compid =d2.compid left join User_dept u on w.compid =u.compid and w.Department =u.deptid where w.RequestNumber =#{requestNumber} and w.compid =#{compid}
